description: Shame they couldn't even open-source it. It was once the best integrated bowser/email-client around, but they seem to have stopped supporting the Linux version. Now it stinks. Seriously. Like a dead kipper.
summary: it used to be good, but now they've given up on Linux. Don't touch it
